title: Reisman's Bakery, Brooklyn - Menu, Reviews (58), Photos (28) - Restaurantji
text: Reisman's Bakery $ â¢ Bakery Hours: 106-110 Avenue O, Brooklyn (718) 331-1975 About Reisman's Bakery Reisman's Bakery offers delicious baked goods that can now be shipped nationwide. Customers from New Jersey to California and even upstate Albany praise the quality and nostalgic taste of their treats, especially the black and white cookies. With easy ordering, perfect packaging, and even sugar-free options available, this bakery has gained loyal customers who rate it 5 stars for its exceptional products. Customers' Favorites Reisman's Bakery Reviews The cake is amazing, the poppy seed roll is as good or better than my mom's (don't tell her ï¿½ ï¿½ ï¿½) I buy it at The Fooderie in West Orange NJ. They told me my order would be here on November 27th. Then March 1st. Now March 3rd! Thatâs almost a week! So my âfreshâ, expensive bakery goods will now be old and stale. They blamed their chosen delivery service and did nothing to compensate me for my week old goods. Never again! fresh and delicious!
